caption.p: Score plot ( A) and loading plot ( B) of GC data obtained from F. caratavica, F. kuchistanica, F. pseudoreoselinum, F. samarcandica, F. tenuisecta and F. varia essential oil analyses using principal component analysis (PCA). In the loading plot, compounds are given numbers as in Table 1 where the major discriminatory signals are Î±-pinene (4), palmitic acid (95) and 10,13-docosadienoic acid methyl ester (102).
